item.title: Getting Started with Wireshark - Part 3
item.description: “Why, sometimes I’ve believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.”   Lewis Carroll (Through the Looking Glass)   Let’s do a quick recap of the first two posts in the Getting Started with Wireshark series.

item.title: Getting Started with Wireshark - Part 2
item.description: “Etiquette mean behaving yourself a little better than is absolutely essential”   Will Cuppy   THREE WAY HANDSHAKE - Establishing the connection   Your computer is constantly having conversations with other network devices, servers, and maybe even streaming platforms.

item.title: Getting Started with Wireshark - Part 1
item.description: “Wireshark isn’t nearly as scary as real sharks!”   Me, I said that   WHAT IS WIRESHARK   Wireshark is a program that captures the traffic of computers and servers.

item.title: Why DataCamp Works Well for Teachers
item.description: “I didn’t start with the courage and confidence. I started with the risk.”   Laura Davies (British golfer)   The tech world is a huge world and there is so much advice out there.

item.title: Getting Started with LinkedIn
item.description: “There’s something delicious about writing those first few words of a story. You can never quite tell where they will take you.
